TEXT: A craven vintner climbing the spire in search of something that will finally NL cleanse his twisted palate.
NL You lock onto what you think are vitals and hope for the best.

Navigating an unlit street, you come across several hooded figures in the midst of some dark ritual. As you approach, they turn to you in eerie unison. The tallest among them bares fanged teeth and extends a long, pale hand towards you. NL ~"Join~ ~us~ ~craven~ ~one,~ ~and~ ~feel~ ~the~ ~warmth~ ~of~ ~the~ ~Spire."~

#rGUILT. NL NL #r~Liar.~ #r~Monster.~ #r~Murderer.~ The truths of your inner voice bit deep, but no matter how deep it was never enough to shake you off your addictions. You managed to ~steel~ yourself, to put the ~mask~ back on, and keep playing the ~game.~ You didn't think there was ~anything~ that could force you to change...
